person.persName: George Morgan Thomas (Lewis Co politician; 10th Judicial District Commonwealth’s Attorney)

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Lewis County politician and Tenth Judicial District Commonwealth’s Attorney. Lewis County native. Married Catherine H. William Thomas in 1850. Admitted to the Kentucky bar in 1851. Lewis County attorney from 1854 to 1858. Lewis County representative from 1860 to 1862. Tenth judicial district Commonwealth’s Attorney from 1863 to 1869. Involved in the nativist Know-Nothing movement. Later held a judgeship.

Spouse: Catherine Thomas
Children: Bruce Fraser Thomas, Walter William Thomas, Araminta Thomas Pugh, and Mary A. Thomas.
